problem.markdown:
1. OFFD stands for (x) OFF delay timer () OFF discrete Output () OFF discrete input
2) PIN stands for () Peak Input () Pulse Output (x) Pulse Input
3) The NOT block is available under ------ library () Math () IO (x) Logical
4) In retentive timer, what happens in case of input/ supply failure? () The accumulated value goes back to zero (x) The accumulated value is retained () Can’t predict the status of accumulator
5) Traffic Control is example of -------- control system. (x) Open loop () Cascade () Closed loop
problem.p: 3) The NOT block is available under ------ library

choicegroup.choice: The accumulated value goes back to zero
Can’t predict the status of accumulator
